list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Added Particles -added some particles flying when you cut a tree or hit a monster with your fireball.
-need to optimize game and fix screen scaling

task.summary: Default task
Start of making the map - Date:October 23, 2024
Start of making the map - Date:October 23, 2024
Collision Implemented - Date:October 24, 2024
Objects Implemented (but not yet interactable) - Date:October 24, 2024
Objects Implemented (but not yet interactable) - Date:October 24, 2024
Objects Implemented (mana and coins) check console for counter (alt tab when object is picked up) (note: still needs optimization)
Sounds Implemented added coin sound effect but cannot be heard well due to bg music. also more items added and added HP and Boots to add speed (note: still needs optimization)
UI Implemented -playtime is now shown -new text appears when object is picked up -fixed the collision values for player //to fix object collision values (note: still needs optimization)

Improved Rendering Performance -press T to show draw time (before optimization draw time was 600000 - 800000 or 0.006 - 0.008 seconds, after optimization it is now 0.001 average) -cleaned up code a little bit -added utility class for scaling image for better performance
Added NPC class -new radish npc (has simple AI implemented to randomize walk direction) -hit box values need to be fixed -cleaned up code a little bit
Added Dialogue -to talk with npc, collide with npc and press ENTER key -Added font -still need to fix hit box values

Added Title Screen -classes can be replaced with difficulty choices like ease, medium, or hard -choosing a class will do nothing atm -choosing load game will do nothing atm -still need to fix hit box values
Added HUD Life for player -added new key handler for ESCAPE key now used to pause, and when in paused state press ENTER for easy game exit -still need to fix hit box values
Added EVENTS -Press F for Heal near the water -still need to fix hit box values
Fixed Rendering -still need to fix hit box values for npc
Fixed Rendering -still need to fix hit box values for npc
Fixed Rendering -still need to fix hit box values for npc
Added Monster Class -when player is damaged player becomes immune for 1 second and then can be damaged again after -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Attack animation and attack damage -heil sprite for load screen display -when monster is damaged, becomes immune for 1 second and then can be damaged again after -need to fix hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Monster Health Bar & Death Animation -added swing sword sound effect, and others -added passive AI for bat monster -need to fix hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc
Added Character Status UI -Press P to access character UI -need to fix hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Scrolling Message, Leveling Up, Damage Calculation -Press P to access character UI - when healing using the healing pool, the monsters respawn -need to optimize hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc
Added Inventory -Press P to access inventory -WASD keys to move inventory cursor -need to optimize hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Equipables & Usable Items -Press P to access inventory and enter key to switch or use items -added new axe weapon, has more damage than sword but less range (using heil sprite for now) -WASD keys to move inventory cursor -need to optimize hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Projectiles -Press F to shoot projectile -added new fireball, still need to implement mana
-need to fix fireball solid area -need to optimize hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Monster Projectiles and Mana -Press F to shoot projectile -added new fireball
-need to optimize game and fix screen scaling -need to fix fireball solid area -need to optimize hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Item Drops -change key to interact to E -Press F to shoot projectile -added new fireball
-need to optimize game and fix screen scaling -need to fix item drops solid area -need to fix fireball solid area -need to optimize hit box value for sword attack area -still need to fix hit box values for radish npc

Added Breaking Objects -need axe to cut down tree -added interactive Tile dry tree and trunk -Fixed most hit boxes for entities and objects
-need to optimize game and fix screen scaling

Added Particles -added some particles flying when you cut a tree or hit a monster with your fireball.
-need to optimize game and fix screen scaling
